column4: I am running ubuntu 9.04 and if i upgrade to 9.10 from update manager then how much files size ubuntu will download to update to 9.10 ?

Can't remember...depends on how many packages you already have installed on your system, some may have become obseleted since 9.04, others may rhave acquired new, additional dependences and then there are also your new apps...probably a few hundred MBs...not sure
could you tell me apprx time ?
it depends...probably about 2 hours...depending on things like internet connection, ram, cpu, etc
